cannotConnectModal.title: You can't connect?
cannotConnectModal.content: You can check your login or reset your password on the [%{vendorName}](%{vendorLink})'s website.
cannotConnectModal.noAccount: If you do not have an account you will need to create one on the [%{vendorName}](%{vendorLink})'s website.

accountForm.notClientSide: To synchronize your %{name} data in your Cozy you must use the Cozy app on your phone or tablet.

clientSide.title: Connect to your Cozy
clientSide.description: Connect %{name} to your Cozy to synchronize your account and retrieve all your data.

desynchronized.message: you have desynchronized this account on %{date}

confirm-deletion.description: This will also delete your transactions along with bill links. If you do not wish to reimport your banking data at the next scheduled synchronization, you'll have to remove the connection.
confirm-deletion.title: Are you definitive ?

contractForm.deletion_error: An error occurred while group deletion.
contractForm.label: Label

runningAlert.title: Don't Close Your App!
runningAlert.body: For the data recovery to be complete, the phone must remain turned on. However, you can continue to browse within the mobile app as long as it stays active in the foreground.

drive.title: Your documents
drive.description: This service retrieves your latest documents and keeps a complete back-up for you.

contacts.title: Your contacts
contacts.description: This service synchronizes all your contacts for you.

banks.title: Your banking data
banks.description: This service retrieves and keeps a complete record of your latest banking operations for you.

coachco2.title: Apps to go further
coachco2.description: The following apps are able to use privately this kind of data inside your Cozy.

information.title: Useful information
information.storeDescription: Access the description of this app

DISK_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.title: Storage full
DISK_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.description: This service cannot fetch your documents now. Please remove some files or go to **Settings > Storage** to get more free space.

CHALLENGE_ASKED.title: Challenge required
CHALLENGE_ASKED.description: The website requires a second authentification factor. You may re-run the connector manually to provide the code and continue to retrieve your data.

OAUTH_CANCELED.title: Canceled
OAUTH_CANCELED.description: We could not add your bank since you canceled the connection. Click "Add your bank" one more time to try again.

LOGIN_FAILED.title: Incorrect or expired credentials
LOGIN_FAILED.description: Sorry, your login or password are invalid or are expired. You may check your credentials on [%{name}](%{link}) website before updating.

LOGIN_FAILED.NEEDS_SECRET.title: Additional information needed
LOGIN_FAILED.NEEDS_SECRET.description: An additional field must be filled in to connect your service. You may re-run the connector manually to provide the information.

LOGIN_FAILED.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS.title: Temporarily blocked
LOGIN_FAILED.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS.description: Too many attempts occured. Please update your credentials on [%{name}](%{link}) website and update the konnector later on.

MAINTENANCE.title: Unavailable website
MAINTENANCE.description: It seems that the [%{name}](%{link}) website is unavailable or the konnector must be updated. Please rerun the connector later or visit our online help.

NOT_EXISTING_DIRECTORY.title: Missing destination folder
NOT_EXISTING_DIRECTORY.description: It seems that this account's destination folder has been deleted. Please restore it by disconnecting this account and then reconnect again.

TERMS_VERSION_MISMATCH.title: Latest Terms of Service non accepted
TERMS_VERSION_MISMATCH.description: %{name} seems to have updated its Terms Of Service. Please check that the service is up to date. It this error still occurs, please contact us at [%{supportMail}](mailto:%{supportMail}).

UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: Connection error
UNKNOWN_ERROR.description: An unknown error has occurred. You can try to update your data. If the problem persists, please contact us at [%{supportMail}](mailto:%{supportMail}).

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.title: Action needed on the provider's website
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.description: It seems that the [%{name}](%{link}) website requires you to log in and to complete a specific action. Please re-run the connector once you have settled the issue on the website.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.OAUTH_OUTDATED.title: Access renewal required
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.OAUTH_OUTDATED.description: The [%{name}](%{link}) service requires you to renew your authentication. Please disconnect and reconnect your account %{name} to this application. No data will be lost.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.ACCOUNT_REMOVED.title: Unavailable account
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.ACCOUNT_REMOVED.description: It seems that your account is no longer active. Please check your account on [%{name}](%{link}) before retry.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.CHANGE_PASSWORD.title: Password update required
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.CHANGE_PASSWORD.description: It seems that the [%{name}](%{link}) website requires you to log in and update your password. Please rerun the connector once you have settled the issue on the website.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.PERMISSIONS_CHANGED.title: New permissions needed
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.PERMISSIONS_CHANGED.description: You connector was updated and the permissions changed. Please validate them before launching the connector again.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.SCA_REQUIRED.title: Renewal of authentication  required
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.SCA_REQUIRED.description: It seems that %{name} requires a login recheck for the synchronisation to work. Please re-run the connector to start the verification process. You will receive a one-time password or a validation process on your bank application or website.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.TWOFA_EXPIRED.title: Authentication renewal required
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.TWOFA_EXPIRED.description: The last connexion to the service failed; please launch it again. You may have to provide a validation code.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.WEBAUTH_REQUIRED.title: Authentication on vendor website required
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.WEBAUTH_REQUIRED.description: It seems that [%{name}](%{link}) requires you to log in on their website for the synchronisation to work. Please re-run the connector once you have settled the issue on the website.

USER_ACTION_NEEDED.WRONG_TWOFA_CODE.title: Incorrect strong authentication code
USER_ACTION_NEEDED.WRONG_TWOFA_CODE.description: The second-factor code provided is incorrect, please start again.

VENDOR_DOWN.title: Unavailable service
VENDOR_DOWN.description: It seems that the [%{name}](%{link}) service is unavailable at the moment. Please rerun the connector later.

VENDOR_DOWN.BANK_DOWN.title: Unavailable bank website
VENDOR_DOWN.BANK_DOWN.description: Access to the [%{name}](%{link}) customer area is currently unavailable. Please rerun the connector later

VENDOR_DOWN.LINXO_DOWN.title: Unavailable service
VENDOR_DOWN.LINXO_DOWN.description: It seems that we are experiencing overload with our bank konnectors at the moment. Please rerun the connector later.

ACCOUNT_WITH_SAME_IDENTIFIER_ALREADY_DEF.title: This account already exists
ACCOUNT_WITH_SAME_IDENTIFIER_ALREADY_DEF.description: Your possible modification of the list of synchronized accounts will be taken into account within a few minutes.

konnectorUpdate.title: An update is available for this service.

body.regular: Perform this update to keep fetching your data and to have the latest features:
body.blocking: Update it to keep fetching your data:

deleteBIConnection.title: Bank disconnect
deleteBIConnection.description: Your request has been recorded. It will be effective in a short moment. Previously imported data will not be deleted.

deleteAccount.title: Disconnection
deleteAccount.description: Your account will be disconnected, but already imported data will be kept.

updateAccount.delete-account-error: Account could not be disconnected, please retry later or contact our support.

connect.description: Connect %{name} to your Cozy to synchronize your account and automatically retrieve all your data.
connect.label: Connect
connect.title: Connect to your Cozy

triggerSuccessMessage.description: Your data will be available in a few minutes and the next ones will follow automatically.
triggerSuccessMessage.title: Successful configuration!

providers.default: Enter the code sent to you by e-mail or SMS
providers.email: Enter the code sent to you by e-mail
providers.sms: Enter the code sent to you by SMS
providers.app_code: Enter the one-time code to generate in ${name} mobile app
providers.app: Use your provider's app to continue authentication

twoFAForm.desc-2fa: You need to open your provider's app to confirm your authentication. In some cases, you will have to validate two times.
twoFAForm.desc_1: This code enables you to finish your connexion.
twoFAForm.desc_2: The second code received on your mobile phone or by email enables you to finalize your connexion.

success.title: Successful configuration!
success.connect: Your data will be available in a few minutes and the next ones will follow automatically.
success.driveLinkText: Open the folder in Cozy Drive

suggestions.title: Import your data from %{name}
suggestions.data: Installing %{name} will automatically import the following data:
suggestions.reason_bank: %{name} has been detected in one of your bank transactions. Don't worry, no one else can access this information

dataType.none: %{name} won't access any of your personal data

vaultCiphersList.title: From which account do you want to import your data?

confirmationModal.title: Update credentials?
confirmationModal.description: Your previous credentials will be definitively lost. Add a new account to keep them.

connectionBackdrop.progress: Establishing a connection to %{name} can take up to 30 seconds...

disconnectedAccountModal.disconnected-help: This account is disconnected. Your data has been kept. If you want to restart the synchronisation, please reconfigure your account with the "Add a bank" button.

konnectorBlock.fatalError: An error occurred while recovering the service. If this problem persists, do not hesitate to contact us at [%{name}](%{link})

trips.title: Last trips
trips.caption: See your 5 most recent trips retrieved on %{konnectorName}

files.title: Your documents
files.caption: This service retrieves your latest documents and keeps a complete back-up for you.
